### **CareerFair.AI**
### *Privacy Statement*           
#### Disclaimer: The **CareerFair.AI** research team is committed to protecting the privacy and accuracy of confidential information to the extent possible, subject to provisions of state and federal law. Other than as required by laws that guarantee public access to certain types of information, or in response to subpoenas or other legal instruments that authorize access, personal information is not actively shared. We do not re-distribute or sell personal information collected on our web servers.
---
### **What information is collected from the Users?**
#### User behavior on the website is tracked using:
* Username provided by the User
* Unique anonymous ID generated by Qualtrics.
(if User was referred to this site from Qualtrics while participating in a research study).
---

### **CareerFair.Ai website collects the following analytics:**
* Username (Generated by the User).
* Email address (If provided by the User).
* Access dates and times.
* User input (e.g., queries or questions submitted by the User).

*All the data collected are based on User’s use of the website.*

---

### **Cookies**
**CareerFair.AI** website may use first-party cookies, which will be stored directly by the website to deliver web content specific to individual users' interests. Sensitive personal information is not stored within cookies. **CareerFair.AI** website does not host any third-party cookies which may lead to any instance of user-tracking.

---
### **Distribution of Collected Information:**
Any data collected will be protected and will not be shared with any external parties, including third-party software. The distribution of the data will be authorized only to approved project staff trained in protection of collected data. For Users participating in research studies involving this website, please refer to the IRB consent form for additional information related to use of information for research purposes.

---
### **Use of collected information:**
Collected User data will only be used for research purposes. The data will be accessed only by the CareerFair.ai project’s research team, which includes researchers, web/software developers directly involved in the project, and research assistants working on the project.  Data will be retained only for so long as is necessary for the purpose(s) for which they were collected.

---
### **Privacy Statement Revisions:**
This Privacy Statement was last revised on *7th of October 2021*. We may change this Privacy Statement at any time and for any reason. We encourage you to review this Privacy Statement each time you visit the web site. 
Please feel free to contact our team at careerfair.ai@gmail.com, with any questions or concerns regarding the Privacy Statement, data management, or the project itself.
